headline: Is American Water Works Still Priced Fairly After Recent Infrastructure Approval News?
summary: If you are wondering whether American Water Works Company is quietly becoming good value after a choppy few years, this breakdown will help you decide whether AWK deserves a spot on your watchlist or simply a place on your broader radar. The stock is up 6.3% year to date and 7.1% over the last year, even though it has slipped 1.8% in the past week and is roughly flat over the past month. This pattern suggests improving sentiment, but not a runaway rally. Recent headlines have focused on...
